name: ServiceNow
description: This plugin is used to create incidents on the Incident > All page, security incidents on the Security Incident > Incidents > Show All Incidents page, GRC issues on the Policy and Compliance > Issues > All Issues page and records on the Custom Table record page of the ServiceNow platform. It also supports updating incidents/issues and syncing their status. This plugin is NOT the same as ServiceNow's DLP Incident Response product, nor does this plugin works with that solution.

fields.label: Username
fields.description: Username of your ServiceNow instance. Username can be created from 'System Security > Users and Groups > Users' page of the ServiceNow instance.

fields.label: Password
fields.description: Password of your ServiceNow instance. Password for the username can be set from 'System Security > Users and Groups > Users > Select User > Set Password' page of the ServiceNow instance.

fields.label: Destination Table
fields.description: Select the ServiceNow table where incidents/issues will be created. Any changes in this parameter will affect all the created tickets by this plugin configuration in the Netskope CE.
